name: canvas-app-creator
description: Canvas App Creator - Full Stack Application

scripts.dev:full: npm run install-deps && concurrently "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:backend"
scripts.install-deps: pnpm install && cd frontend && pnpm install && cd ../backend && pnpm install && cd ..
scripts.build: cd frontend && pnpm run build && cd ../backend && pnpm run build
